biotools.summary:
Complement Genome Annotation Lift Over Using a Weighted Sequence Alignment Strategy.

This toolkit deals with GEnomic sequence and genome structure ANnotation files between inbreeding lines and species.

The gene sequence and genetic feature variation between different individuals are very important for natural variation research
